a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Gini Index around 2015 vs. Gini Index around 2000
Estimates are based on household survey data of either incomes or consumption. Countries are only shown
where comparable surveys falling within three years of each reference year were available.
Data source: Povcal (2018), The Chartbook of Economic Inequality (2017), Kanbur et al (2017) Table 1.B; HYDE (2023); Gapminder
